name: Tonight, I'll kill the White Whale
name_original: Tonight, I'll kill the White Whale
description:
This is a short narrative game about monsters. 

Use the keyboard's Arrow keys or A and D to navigate in the world. 

Interact with objects, read the news,  and go to the right.

  • Soundtrack: Trust, from the Wong Janice (Bandcamp)
  • Follow me: twitter.com/CMarjoux
